name: Heads Up - Rounded Fun
description:
How far can you get?

Save your balls, you must avoid being crushed by the screen, use the accelerometer of your device to control your balls, move your device from side to side to make your way across the platforms and enemies and get as far as you can, touch the screen to jump and avoid the obstacles in your way.

Powerups

Touch to activate them and help you on your adventure.

Leaderboards

Compete with your friends and show who is the best at this.

Instructions

-Tilt your device to move the ball.

-Touch the powerups to activate them (Bomb, heart, clock and Yellow Power Brick)

-Avoid Flies
